The 30 meter long wedge-shaped freighter was designed to compete with CEC's YT series. While it had a weaker hull and shields than a stock YT-1300, the Muurian transport was as fast as some starfighters and was heavily armed with two double laser cannon turrets, three laser cannons, and two proton torpedo launchers. Because of its armament, the Muurian transport was used as an assault ship by the Rebel Alliance, rogue Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin, and some pirate groups.
